details.songOfAdoration: Low in the Grave He Lay #160

list: Caleb Collins’ memorial service will be held Saturday, April 26 at 2:00 in the sanctuary with a fellowship meal immediately following.
Vacation Bible School—AiG’s Wonder Junction—is June 15-18. We will have a brief organizational meeting following next week’s morning worship service.
